name: Brick It!
description:
Brick It!

Do you feel your blood being pumped up by looking at this testosterone-packed mini-adventure? Then Brick It! is for you!

Your life will eventually be forfeit. How long can you last until those 4 ugly and menacing turrets kill you? Try to stand up and put up a last struggle.

The show is yours (and maybe the highscore?).

Controls: Keyboard

Move : WASD / Arrows

Dash : Spacebar

Pause : Escape

Controller

Move : Left Joystick / Directional Buttons

Dash : Y

Pause : Start

Team

Axel Born - Developer

Didier Hémery - Developer

Aurélien Montero - Audio

Changelog

14/08 : Fixed some performance issues and a typo with the name.

Made with Unity.
